<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_801107_library_m_books</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_801107_library_m_books">assigned_toVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assigned_to" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Set Date Time</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var days;
    var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
    var addgdt = new GlideDateTime();
	current.assigned_by = gs.getUserId();
    try {
        if (current.assigned_to && current.table_name == 'x_801107_library_m_students') {
            // 		current.assigned_date_time = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
            // 	current.return_date_time = gs.daysAgo(-10);
            current.assigned_date_time = gdt;
            addgdt.addDaysUTC(10);
            current.return_date_time = addgdt;
        } else if (current.assigned_to && current.table_name == 'x_801107_library_m_members') {
            current.assigned_date_time = gdt;
            addgdt.addDaysUTC(20);
            current.return_date_time = addgdt;
        } else {
            current.assigned_date_time = "";
            current.return_date_time = "";
        }
    } catch (e) {
        gs.addInfoMessage("set date time ", e);
    }


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-21 07:03:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7d687fc7474561104f7fee38436d4313</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Date Time</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Library Management" source="x_801107_library_m">33e049d247c521104f7fee38436d4377</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Library Management">33e049d247c521104f7fee38436d4377</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7d687fc7474561104f7fee38436d4313</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-02 10:55:06</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7d687fc7474561104f7fee38436d4313"/></record_update>
